==Description== The currency earned from the [[Battle Frontier]].
==Multipliers==
There is a hidden multiplier called the Battle Multiplier that is determined by the last stage you've beaten divided by 100, but is never less than 1.
<math>Battle Multiplier = max(\frac{stageBeaten}{100},1)</math>
===Rates=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Awarded !! Rate |- | [[Battle Points]] [[File:Battlepoints.png|15px]] || stageBeaten * battleMultiplier |- | Money {{pdollar}} || stageBeaten * 100 * battleMultiplier |}
